statements: DELETE FROM WeatherData WHERE Temperature > 30 AND Humidity < 60;
DELETE FROM WeatherData WHERE Temperature > 30 AND Humidity < 60;

DELETE FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 30 AND humidity < 60;
DELETE FROM city WHERE country = 'USA' AND city_name = 'New York';
DELETE FROM temperature_data WHERE station_id = 1 AND date < '2022-01-01';
